title: God Bless The NFL Trade Deadline with Adam Schefter!
description:
Adam Schefter joins Stugotz, Golic, Mikey and Billy as he races through the halls of ESPN from a TV hit to a podcast recording. The guys break down the biggest trades at the deadline and try to plan Mike Golic's 60th birthday party.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
